text: Ra hamro nimti sansarama pani bhalo lekhide'u ra akhirata (paraloka)ma pani, hami timitira unmukha hunchau. Allahale bhan'yoh ma aphno yatanale usaila'i grasta garchu, jasala'i cahanchu tara mero dayalutabata sabaikura acchadita chan. Ra tyo daya ti manisaharuko namama avasya lekhnechu jo allahasita darachan ra jakata (dharmadaya) dinchan ra jo hamra ayatamathi imana lya'umchan
